workExperience.description: Worked on fullstack Android, Web, and AI projects.

projects.name: Sentry Error Monitoring Dashboard
projects.description: Implemented error tracking with Sentry of 3000+ weekly exceptions from client devices using Java Spring Boot + React.js analytics dashboard to aggregate logs with internal data for faster debugging. Also used Gemini for error analysis and triaging.

projects.name: BlueFletch Chat App
projects.description: Worked on Bluefletch Chat App in Java/Kotlin on features such as voice transcription.

projects.name: AI SQL Event Explorer Assistant
projects.description: Extended the company's Enterprise Portal (React/Express) with an AI-powered SQL assistant (Gemini), enabling non-technical staff and clients to generate BigQuery SQL database queries more efficiently using an event explorer.

projects.name: Health Status Monitor
projects.description: Built a Google Cloud-based infrastructure monitoring platform with a JavaScript React frontend, Node.js + Express backend, and Docker, alerting customer success teams of downtime of key services.

workExperience.description: Researched algorithms for LiDAR-based Autonomous Robotic Mapping

projects.name: LiDAR-based Autonomous Robotic Mapping
projects.description: Designed and implemented a LiDAR-based robotic mapping algorithm in Python and ROS2 to enhance autonomous navigation. Built mapping pipelines leveraging Quadtrees for spatial data representation and applied graph search algorithms (Breadth-First Search and Depth-First Search) for optimized pathfinding.

workExperience.description: Contributed to the NLP/Document AI team.

projects.name: Resume Parsing System
projects.description: Contributed to the NLP/Document AI team, training machine learning models to extract structured data from resumes. Fine-tuned LayoutLM, LiLT, and BERT models in Python (PyTorch/HuggingFace) for layout and text understanding, achieving up to 90% accuracy on a dataset of over 900 labeled resumes.
